COMMENT_TX: Soriano's 250th career stolen base; became the 19th player with 250 steals and 250 home runs
Cubs center fielder Milton Bradley left the game due to an injured groin
Brewers catcher Mike Rivera left the game due to an injured foot/ankle
Cubs third baseman Aramis Ramirez left the game due to an injured neck/shoulder

replay,6,gloar001,FLO,darlg901,MIL06,F,Y,I,,H $Ross Gload hit a ball into the right field corner; it cleared the 8-foot wall and was ruled a homer by first base umpire Bruce Dreckman; the Brewers complained about the call; crew chief Gary Darling took about two minutes to watch the replay and reversed the call from homer to foul
Brewers shortstop J. Hardy left the game due to an injured head
Ryan Braun was hit on the right wrist
Brewers left fielder Ryan Braun left the game due to an injured wrist
umpchange,3,ump1b,belld901 umpchange,3,ump2b,(None) $1B umpire Jerry Crawford left the game after becoming ill
Debut game for Aaron Poreda
Twins shortstop Nick Punto left the game due to an injured chest

$the relay throw to the plate by Brendan Harris skipped past catcher Joe Mauer; pitcher Nick Blackburn was backing up the play and threw to 3B trying to get Jason Kendall advancing but the throw sailed past Joe Crede
Debut game for Ryan Sadowski
Giants third baseman Pablo Sandoval left the game due to an injured chest
$Mets center fielder Fernando Martinez slipped while chasing the fly ball; the ball landed about two feet away

ej,wartd101,C,wolfj901,Balls and strikes $Mets Pitching Coach Dan Warthen went to the mound to talk with Johan Santana; as Warthen left the field he said something to HP umpire Jim Wolf and was ejected
$the relay throw to the plate by SS Alex Cora bounced away from catcher Omir Santos; pitcher Johan Santana backed up the play and his throw to 3B went into LF
fan interference

ej,sveud001,C,hohnb901,Checked swing ej,randw001,C,hohnb901,Non-swing on check swing Brewers Batting Coach Dale Sveum ejected by HP umpire Bill Hohn for arguing that Yovani Gallardo checked his swing on strike three; on the third pitch to Albert Pujols, HP umpire Bill Hohn asked 1B Bruce Dreckman if Pujols had checked his swing; when Dreckman ruled no swing, the Brewers dugout argued and bench coach Willie Randolph was ejected by Hohn
$Josh Willingham becomes the 13th player and 3rd NL player to hit two grand slams in the same game

replay,3,braur002,MIL,westj901,MIL06,O,Y,I,,H $Ryan Braun's fly to deep CF hit the glove of Nationals centerfielder Nyjer Morgan and then went behind the glove, striking the yellow stripe at the top of the Wall; it was ruled a home run; the umpires huddled and then crew chief Joe West watched the replay and reversed the call to ball in play; West allowed Craig Counsell to score and placed Braun at 3B
$Umpire Joe West's 4000th game in the majors
ej,riggj801,M,westj901,Balls and strikes Nationals Manager Jim Riggleman ejected by HP umpire Joe West
$Line drive off Colome's pitching hand, X-rays show no break
Debut game for Cesar Carrillo
Debut game for Samuel Gervacio

replay,6,pench001,HOU,welkt901,MIL06,F,Y,I,,H $Hunter Pence hit a fly ball down the LF line the was ruled fair and a home run; crew chief Tim Welke looked at the replay and overturned the call to a foul ball
originally E1, changed to single plus E1 two days later
Debut game for Dan Runzler
$the Brewers all greeted Prince Fielder at the plate; he jumped onto the plate and the team all fell down around him
Cardinals left fielder Matt Holliday left the game due to an injured knee
Debut game for Tyler Colvin
Debut game for Josh Butler
